verses.verse: And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H9598>song<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5337>delivered<s%> him from the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H340>enemies<s%> and from the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is my <S%H5553>rock<s%> and my <S%H4686>fortress<s%> and my <S%H6403>deliverer;<s%>

My <S%H430>God,<s%> my <S%H6697>rock,<s%> in whom I <S%H2620>take<s%> <S%H2620>refuge;<s%> My <S%H4043>shield<s%> and the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> my <S%H4869>stronghold<s%> and my <S%H4498>refuge;<s%> My <S%H3467>savior,<s%> Thou dost <S%H3467>save<s%> me from <S%H2555>violence.<s%>
"I <S%H7121>call<s%> upon the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> who is worthy to be <S%H1984>praised;<s%> And I am <S%H3467>saved<s%> from my <S%H340>enemies.<s%>
"For the <S%H4867>waves<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H661>encompassed<s%> me; The <S%H5158>torrents<s%> of <S%H1100>destruction<s%> <S%H1204>overwhelmed<s%> me;
The <S%H9112>cords<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> me; The <S%H4170>snares<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H6923>confronted<s%> me.

"In my <S%H9496>distress<s%> I <S%H7121>called<s%> upon the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Yes, I <S%H7121>cried<s%> to my <S%H430>God;<s%> And from His <S%H1964>temple<s%> He <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> And my <S%H7775>cry<s%> for <S%H7775>help<s%> [came] into His <S%H241>ears.<s%>

"Then the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1607>shook<s%> and <S%H7493>quaked,<s%> The <S%H4144>foundations<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> were <S%H7264>trembling<s%> And were <S%H1607>shaken,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> He was <S%H2734>angry.<s%>
<S%H6227>"Smoke<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up out of His <S%H639>nostrils,<s%> And <S%H784>fire<s%> from His <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H398>devoured;<s%> <S%H1513>Coals<s%> were <S%H1197>kindled<s%> by it.
"He <S%H5186>bowed<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> also, and <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> With <S%H6205>thick<s%> <S%H6205>darkness<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> His <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
"And He <S%H7392>rode<s%> on a <S%H3742>cherub<s%> and <S%H5774>flew;<s%> And He <S%H7200>appeared<s%> on the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H7307>wind.<s%>

"And He <S%H7896>made<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> <S%H5521>canopies<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> Him, A <S%H2841>mass<s%> of <S%H4325>waters,<s%> <S%H5645>thick<s%> <S%H5645>clouds<s%> of the <S%H7834>sky.<s%>
"From the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> Him <S%H1513>Coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> were <S%H1197>kindled.<s%>
"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7481>thundered<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> And the <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High<s%> <S%H5414>uttered<s%> His <S%H6963>voice.<s%>
"And He <S%H7971>sent<s%> out <S%H2671>arrows,<s%> and <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them, <S%H1300>Lightning,<s%> and <S%H2000>routed<s%> them.

"Then the <S%H650>channels<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H7200>appeared,<s%> The <S%H4144>foundations<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> were <S%H1540>laid<s%> <S%H1540>bare,<s%> By the <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> At the <S%H5397>blast<s%> of the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of His <S%H639>nostrils.<s%>
"He <S%H7971>sent<s%> from on <S%H4791>high,<s%> He <S%H3947>took<s%> me; He <S%H4871>drew<s%> me out of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>
"He <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me from my <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H340>enemy,<s%> From those who <S%H8130>hated<s%> me, for they were <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H553>strong<s%> for me.
"They <S%H6923>confronted<s%> me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H343>calamity,<s%> But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was my <S%H9305>support.<s%>
"He also <S%H3318>brought<s%> me <S%H3318>forth<s%> into a <S%H4800>broad<s%> <S%H4800>place;<s%> He <S%H2502>rescued<s%> me, <S%H3588>because<s%> He <S%H2654>delighted<s%> in me.
"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1580>rewarded<s%> me according to my <S%H6666>righteousness;<s%> According to the <S%H1252>cleanness<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands<s%> He has <S%H7725>recompensed<s%> me.
"For I have <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And have not <S%H7561>acted<s%> <S%H7561>wickedly<s%> <S%H4480>against<s%> my <S%H430>God.<s%>
"For <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> [were] <S%H5048>before<s%> me; And [as for] His <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> I did not <S%H5493>depart<s%> from them.
"I was also <S%H8549>blameless<s%> toward Him, And I <S%H8104>kept<s%> myself from my <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
"Therefore the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7725>recompensed<s%> me according to my <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> According to my <S%H1252>cleanness<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> His <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
"With the <S%H2623>kind<s%> Thou dost <S%H2616>show<s%> Thyself <S%H2616>kind,<s%> With the <S%H8549>blameless<s%> Thou dost <S%H8552>show<s%> Thyself <S%H8552>blameless;<s%>
With the <S%H1305>pure<s%> Thou dost <S%H1305>show<s%> Thyself <S%H1305>pure,<s%> And with the <S%H6141>perverted<s%> Thou dost <S%H6617>show<s%> Thyself <S%H6617>astute.<s%>
"And Thou dost <S%H3467>save<s%> an <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> <S%H5971>people;<s%> But Thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are on the <S%H7311>haughty<s%> [whom] Thou dost <S%H8213>abase.<s%>
"For Thou art my <S%H5216>lamp,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5050>illumines<s%> my <S%H2822>darkness.<s%>
"For by Thee I can <S%H7323>run<s%> upon a <S%H1416>troop;<s%> By my <S%H430>God<s%> I can <S%H1801>leap<s%> over a <S%H7791>wall.<s%>

"As for <S%H410>God,<s%> His <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H8549>blameless;<s%> The <S%H565>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H6884>tested;<s%> He is a <S%H4043>shield<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H2620>take<s%> <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in Him.
"For <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H1107>besides<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>? And <S%H4310>who<s%> is a <S%H6697>rock,<s%> <S%H1107>besides<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>?
<S%H410>"God<s%> is my <S%H2428>strong<s%> <S%H4581>fortress;<s%> And He <S%H5425>sets<s%> the <S%H8549>blameless<s%> in His <S%H1870>way.<s%>
"He <S%H7737>makes<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> like hinds' [feet], And <S%H5975>sets<s%> me on my <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places.<s%>
"He <S%H3925>trains<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> for <S%H4421>battle,<s%> So that my <S%H2220>arms<s%> can <S%H5181>bend<s%> a <S%H7198>bow<s%> of <S%H5154>bronze.<s%>
"Thou hast also <S%H5414>given<s%> me the <S%H4043>shield<s%> of Thy <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> And Thy <S%H6038>help<s%> <S%H7235>makes<s%> me <S%H7235>great.<s%>
"Thou dost <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> my <S%H6806>steps<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> me, And my <S%H7166>feet<s%> have not <S%H4571>slipped.<s%>
"I <S%H7291>pursued<s%> my <S%H340>enemies<s%> and <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them, And I did not <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they were <S%H3615>consumed.<s%>
"And I have <S%H3615>devoured<s%> them and <S%H4272>shattered<s%> them, so that they did not <S%H6965>rise;<s%> And they <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> my <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
"For Thou hast <S%H247>girded<s%> me with <S%H2428>strength<s%> for <S%H4421>battle;<s%> Thou hast <S%H3766>subdued<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> me those who <S%H6965>rose<s%> up against me.
"Thou hast also <S%H5414>made<s%> my <S%H340>enemies<s%> <S%H5414>turn<s%> [their] <S%H6203>backs<s%> to me, And I <S%H6789>destroyed<s%> those who <S%H8130>hated<s%> me.
"They <S%H8159>looked,<s%> but <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H3467>save;<s%> [Even] to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> but He did not <S%H6030>answer<s%> them.
"Then I <S%H7833>pulverized<s%> them as the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> I <S%H1854>crushed<s%> [and] <S%H7554>stamped<s%> them as the <S%H2916>mire<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets.<s%>

"Thou hast also <S%H6403>delivered<s%> me from the <S%H7379>contentions<s%> of my <S%H5971>people;<s%> Thou hast <S%H8104>kept<s%> me as <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> A <S%H5971>people<s%> whom I have not <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> me.
<S%H1121>"Foreigners<s%> <S%H5236><s%> <S%H3584>pretend<s%> <S%H3584>obedience<s%> to me; As soon as they <S%H241>hear,<s%> <S%H8085><s%> they <S%H8085>obey<s%> me.
<S%H1121>"Foreigners<s%> <S%H5236><s%> <S%H5034>lose<s%> <S%H5034>heart,<s%> And <S%H2296>come<s%> <S%H2296>trembling<s%> out of their <S%H4526>fortresses.<s%>
"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be my <S%H6697>rock;<s%> And <S%H7311>exalted<s%> be <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation,<s%>
The <S%H410>God<s%> who <S%H5414>executes<s%> <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> for me, And <S%H3381>brings<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> me,

Who also <S%H3381>brings<s%> me out from my <S%H340>enemies;<s%> Thou dost even <S%H7311>lift<s%> me <S%H4480>above<s%> those who <S%H6965>rise<s%> up against me; Thou dost <S%H5337>rescue<s%> me from the <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>

<S%H5921>"Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I will <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to Thee, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> And I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises<s%> to Thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>

"[He] is a <S%H9244>tower<s%> of <S%H3444>deliverance<s%> to His <S%H4428>king,<s%> And <S%H6213>shows<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> to His <S%H4899>anointed,<s%> To <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H2233>descendants<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>"
